headline: Monster Beverage Q3 Earnings & Sales Miss on Soft Energy Drink Segment
summary: MNST's Q3 results reflect soft energy drink growth in the United States, along with currency impacts and rising operating expenses that affected sales and margins.

headline: Compared to Estimates, Monster Beverage (MNST) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
